lead_paragraph: While scientists believe the universe began with a Big Bang, most Americans put a big question mark on the concept, an Associated Press-GfK poll found.

headline.main: Poll: Big Bang a Big Question for Most Americans
headline.print_headline: Poll: Big Bang a Big Question for Most Americans

snippet: While scientists believe the universe began with a Big Bang, most Americans put a big question mark on the concept, an Associated Press-GfK poll found....
